info.name: ELIXIR API
info.description: Elixir offers a powerful REST API that supports tokenization in the bitcoin's sidechain of Liquid. It brings powerful features to create a unique NFT standard technology for inter-operable skins.

item.description:
The Elixir API usesAPI Keysto authenticate requests. Authentication to the API is performed with a key. Provide your API key on the token header.
All API requests must be made over HTTPS. Calls made over plain HTTP will fail. API Requests without authentication will also fail.

header.description: Authorization token from the API key belonging to the user / JWT if the request is coming from the front

request.description: This endpoint allows you to upload a game in Elixir. Once you upload all the required information & media files the request is processed

response.name: Updload game

response.body:
"_id": "3637b83b-9634-427e-ba76-988964916375",
    "status": "DRAFT",
    "information": {
        "name": "Light Nite",
        "genre": ["Multiplayer, MMO, Sandbox"],
        "price": 20,
        "headline": "Earn bitcoin playing the most epic battle-royale",
        "description": "Multiplayer battle-royale game with in-game bitcoin rewards and a minimalistic low-poly & cartoonish design. Bitcoin micro-transactions add a new level of interaction within the game. Players can get bitcoin instantly as they shoot opponents. All in-game items have a real value which players can consume or trade to withdraw your balance using lightning network âš¡",
        "developer": "Satoshis Games",
        "publisher": "Satoshis Games",
        "players": 88761,
        "liquidAddress": "VJLFJfZpBFJ3U9XNJte7ZVVd54dLSACgrGiVN6R16duhTwajxESxqtR7HvLoq3GhvrosgnZceJ5knns9",
        "balance": 303141
    },
    "specs": {
        "minimum": {
            "cpu": "i3",
            "gpu": "NVIDIA GTX 1060",
            "hdd": "300mb",
            "ram": "8gb",
            "os": ["Windows", "Linux", "Mac OS"]
        }, 
        "recommended": {

    },
    "language": {

    },

item.description: This page will help you get started with the upload & management of your games. Below there are all available endpoints.

item.description: This page will help you get started with the management of your in-game assets from your Elixir games. You'll be up and running real quick!
